title: Ticket #698: LOCAL_UNIV_EXECUTE
description:
Missing documentation. The condor_schedd parses and uses the option, but in practice it impacts the condor_starter. 

\label{param:LocalUnivExecute}
\item[\Macro{LOCAL\_UNIV\_EXECUTE}]
  This string value specifies the execute location for local
  universe jobs.  Each running local universe job will receive a
  uniquely named subdirectory within this directory. If not
  specified, it defaults to \verb@$SPOOL/local_univ_execute@.
remarks:
2009-Sep-01 12:52:27 by smoler:
Definition appears in 7.3.2 manual.
check_ins: 2009-Sep-01 12:51   Check-in [24965]: added missing defn for LOCAL_UNIV_EXECUTE; gittrac #698 (By Karen Miller )
